title: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Zolota Balka, Beryslav, Mykhaylivka of Kherson region and Kherson city, Solonchaky ...
content: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Zolota Balka, Beryslav, Mykhaylivka of Kherson region and Kherson city, Solonchaky of Mykolayiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
